articles.author: Bernie Zilio
articles.title: Aaron Phypers' pal claims Denise Richards' black eye was result of a drunken fall, not abuse - Page Six
articles.description: “This is consistent with the ongoing untruthfulness of Denise Richards, who is trying to hide her alcohol problem,” a source close to Phypers alleged on Thursday.
articles.content:
A source close to Aaron Phypers is blaming Denise Richards’ black eye, which she claimed he caused, on her alleged “alcohol problem.”

articles.title: Billy Joel recalls feeling 'like a homewrecker' after he began dating his best friend’s wife: 'I felt very, very guilty’ - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: Billy Joel is opening up in his new documentary 'And So It Goes' about the emotional turmoil that he experienced after he began dating his best friend's wife: 'I felt like a homewrecker.'
articles.content: Billy Joel is opening up about how having an affair with his best friend's wife led him to blow up his heavy metal band and temporarily lose his closest friend. The act also sent the singer-songwrite… [+4208 chars]
